alert.note: Alert for Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 2:24PM AKST until December 27 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow, strong winds and wind chills to 35 below. East winds gusting to 35 mph. Visibility reduced to one half mile or less at time in blowing snow. * WHERE...Over Dalton and Steese Highway Summits. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Large snow drifts could form. The dangerously cold wind chills to 35 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
